text: ikkūṭṭar bhūmiyil sañcaricc taṅṅaḷkku mumpuṇṭāyirunnavaruṭe antyaṁ evvidhamāyirunnuvenn kaṇṭ manas'silākkiyiṭṭillē? avar karutt keāṇṭuṁ bhūmiyil bākkivecca preḍhamāya pāramparyaṅkeāṇṭuṁ ivarekkāḷēṟe prabalanmārāyirunnu. aṅṅane avaruṭe teṟṟukuṟṟaṅṅaḷ kāraṇaṁ allāhu avare piṭikūṭi. allāhuvinṟe śikṣayilninn avare rakṣikkān ārumuṇṭāyirunnilla
